transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan madam boliye.
Executive: Hello. Aise mam sir se baat ho sakti hai kya main tanu baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se abhi baat nahi hui thi thodi der pehle sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Okay mam okay.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello ji IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu main abhi baat nahi hui thi thodi der pehle hamari.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ji to sir wahi main bol rahi thi aapka problem solve hua aapne check kara hi koi nahi us time pe call disconnect ho gaya tha.
Customer: Haan madam hame hai na jab humne service lene se pehle hame bataya gaya tha ki aapko daily inquiry achi aayengi kam se kam 10 se 12 inquiry aayegi fir aisa hoga lekin abhi maine dekha madam savere se hame abhi ek inquiry 4 baje aayi madam.
Executive: Ek inquiry 4 baje aayi hai.
Customer: Ek hi inquiry aayi aur savere ke jo inquiry the wo to number humne lagaye the jinke call the jinke miss call the wo to humne lagaye the madam wo bylead consume karke.
Executive: Accha thik hai wo aap maine teeno difference bataye the na aapko bylead inquiry aur call ke liye.
Customer: Madam wo sab mujhe pata hai wo bylead inquiry jo 11 inquiry aati ki nahi wo mera ye kehna hai ki jo customer abhi daily IndiaMART pe product search karte hai to unko hamari profile hi show nahi ho rahi unko hamara product hi nahi show ho raha madam to kaise kya hame inquiry dalenge.
Executive: Sir ek baat bataiye sir agar show nahi hota to aapke paas call kaise aati aapke paas inquiry kaise aati last month aapke paas 69 inquiry aayi hai is month 13 inquiry aayi hai aapke paas bina show hue sir.
Customer: Madam mujhe ye bataya gaya tha ki daily me aapko kam se kam 10 se 12 inquiries milti rahengi.
Executive: Sir aisa ek baat bataiye aapne abhi plan liya hua hai kitna din hua october me liya ek mahina abhi nahi hua hai sir thoda sa sir thoda sa listing banane me bhi apni apni profile ki time lagta hai sir abhi ek mahina bhi nahi hua hai sir aap aur aap bol rahe hai ki aapko proper inquiry sir fir bhi sir bahut achi aa rahi hai 6 din me 11 inquiry aayi kam nahi hai sorry 6 din me kitni aayi hai inquiry aapke paas.
Customer: Wo direct customer ke to call hi nahi aa rahe madam.
Executive: Direct customer ke call aayi hai sir teen call aayi hai aap IndiaMART ek number whatsapp number kaun sa hai aap mujhe whatsapp number aapne bataya hi nahi.
Customer: Nahi whatsapp nahi hai madam hamara is number ka.
Executive: Koi bhi number ka sir ek koi whatsapp to chalate honge na aap.
Customer: Haan haan whatsapp number matlab ye number kya jo kya jo IndiaMART me registered hai wahi na.
Executive: Nahi nahi koi bhi whatsapp number bataiye jo jo aap use karte hai.
Customer: Ah rukiye main abhi aapko 5 10 minute ke baad me whatsapp number aur mera ye same number whatsapp hai madam.
Executive: Ye wala number sir aapke whatsapp pe hai hi nahi maine check kar liya tha aapka primary number bhi whatsapp nahi hai secondary number bhi nahi hai.
Customer: 92844 jo number hai mera uska whatsapp hai madam wo ek baar dekhna padega wo yahi mobile me kya hua kya nahi to.
Executive: Haan accha.
Customer: Haan ek minute me main aapse aapka aapka whatsapp kaun sa hai madam.
Executive: Sir mera whatsapp number aap likhiye.
Customer: Aap madam aapka naam kya hai sruti tiwari hai kya madam.
Executive: Nahi tanu chaturvedi.
Customer: Accha to hamare account manager kaun hai ye account ke.
Executive: Main hi hu main hi hu sir.
Customer: Aap hi hai kya.
Executive: Thank you sir. Ah to aap mujhe ah 5 ya 10 minute ke baad me call kar sakte hai madam main aapko turant whatsapp number deta hu update karke.
Executive: Thik hai aur sir aapne na customer care pe call kar liya tha mere number pe nahi mera number aapko pata hai kaun sa hai 922.
Customer: Nahi madam mujhe aapke aapke number ke bare me bhi kuch pata nahi kuch bhi nahi aap mujhe ek baar abhi aapka details show karenge to accha rahega.
Executive: Thik hai main 10 minute baad sir main hi aapko call karti hu aap is number pe mat kariega ye customer care number hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai to aap mere main aapko 10 minute baad call karti hu aur sir aapne na customer care pe number pe call kiya mere pe nahi to ek concern mere upar open ho gaya hai to main usko close kar du.
Customer: Thik hai na aap mujhe 10 minute me call karo fir.
Executive: Thik hai aur ye concern close kar du sir main jo mere upar concern open hua hai.
Customer: To madam fir iska solution nikal jayega na.
Executive: Sir ye solution to alag cheez hai na jaise aapne customer care pe call kiya mere number pe nahi to usse concern mere upar.
Customer: Haan thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai na thik hai na abhi ek mail jayegi aapke paas to usse yes kar dijiyega aap thik hai IndiaMART se mail jayegi.
Customer: Nahi nahi aapne abhi close kar dijiye usko.
Executive: Thik hai meri aapse baat ho gayi hai ye ye IndiaMART se ek mail jayegi to usse yes kar dijiyega aur main aapko apne number se call karti hu fir ye concern close ho jayega.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir okay okay sir thik hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received only one inquiry at 4 PM.

- Profile not showing to customers on IndiaMART.

- Wants to know the WhatsApp number.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed 13 inquiries this month.

- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.

- Executive will provide WhatsApp number after updating.

- Executive will close the concern.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, whatsapp number, profile, inquiries
